###########
git-toggle
###########

.. start short_desc

**Toggle Git remotes between https and ssh.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------


.. start installation

``git-toggle`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install git-toggle

.. end installation
